actions.name: Cobbled Stone
actions.description:
Trigger: The user resolves Atlas Crash.

Effect: The user freely uses Stealth Rock as if it were on their Active List.

actions.name: Cobbled Stone
actions.description: Passive: All of the user's Rock-type attacks gain [Drain 3/8].
